title: Laboratory of Heat Engineering and Energy-Saving Technologies of Blast Furnace Smelting

firstPersonCard.name: Chaika Oleksii Leonidovych
firstPersonCard.description: Senior Researcher, Candidate of Technical Sciences
firstPersonCard.researchDirection: Development and implementation of a new scientific direction in the field of blast furnace production – systemic reliability in pig iron production: search for compromise solutions using formalized methods and based on experimental melts, which ensure the required volume of pig iron of specified quality, minimal consumption of energy resources and ensuring the technical reliability of the blast furnace and its servicing units, minimal harmful impact of production on the environment.
firstPersonCard.specialization: 05.16.02  "Metallurgy of Ferrous, Non-Ferrous Metals and Special Alloys"

staffCards.name: Kornilov Bohdan Volodymyrovych

Improvement of existing technologies and development of new technologies (including the use of hydrogen-containing fuel) aimed at decarbonization of blast furnace production.
